instructions: Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Store listing . Under "Product Details," click Manage translations > Add your own translation text . Choose a language. Add your translations. Save your changes.

Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service . In the top right corner, click New order . Select the source language used in your original text. Select target languages for translation. Next to "Store listing text," check the box. Review or add your text. To upload screenshots and other documentation to help translators, go to the bottom of your screen. Next to "Additional information," select Add files . Complete your purchase. On the checkout page, you'll see the expected delivery date. Once your translations are completed, you'll receive an email notification.

Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service . Next to the language you want to apply, select Apply . You'll be taken to the Store listing page to save your changes.

Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service. In the top right corner, click New order . Select the source language used in your original text. Select target languages for translation. Next to "APK strings," check the box. To add your XML source file, select Add files . To upload screenshots and other documentation to help translators, go to the bottom of your screen. Next to "Additional information," select Add files . Complete your purchase. On the checkout page, you'll see the expected delivery date. Once your translations are completed, you'll receive an email notification.

Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service . In the top right corner, click New order . Select the source language used in your original text. Select target languages for translation. Next to "In-app product text," check the box. Under "In-app product text," choose what you want to translate. If your app has inactive items that will be released in the future and need to be translated, move the "Include inactive items" toggle to the right. If your app's inactive items won't be available for purchase again, you don't need to include them in the translation request. To upload screenshots and other documentation to help translators, go to the bottom of your screen. Next to "Additional information," select Add files . Complete your purchase. On the checkout page, you'll see the expected delivery date. Once your translations are completed, you'll receive an email notification.
Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service . Next to the language you want to apply, select Apply .
Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service . For each order, you'll see the date of purchase, requested languages, status, and cost.
Sign in to your Play Console . Select an app. On the left menu, click Store presence > Translation service . On an order, select the three dots icon > Contact service provider .
